title: 115_hr2835
content: There is no relevant information provided in the prev_chunk to summarize the curr_chunk. Section 7(a) of the Small Business Act is amended to include a guarantee fee waiver for veterans or spouses of veterans. The Small Business Act is amended to include a guarantee fee waiver for loans up to $150,000 for veterans or their spouses. The Small Business Act is amended to provide a guarantee fee waiver for loans up to $150,000 for veterans or their spouses, effective from October 1 of the first fiscal year after enactment. The Small Business Act is amended to waive guarantee fees for loans up to $150,000 for veterans or their spouses, effective from October 1 of the first fiscal year after enactment. If the cost for the program established under this subsection is above zero, certain requirements will not apply to loans made during the upcoming fiscal year. The Small Business Act is amended to waive guarantee fees for loans up to $150,000 for veterans or their spouses. The Administrator may not collect a guarantee fee in connection with loans made during the upcoming fiscal year. The Small Business Act is amended to waive guarantee fees for loans up to $150,000 for veterans or their spouses. The Administrator may not collect a guarantee fee for loans made to veterans or their spouses on or after October 1 of the first fiscal year following the enactment of this provision, unless the President's budget for the upcoming fiscal year includes a cost. The Small Business Act is amended to waive guarantee fees for loans up to $150,000 for veterans or their spouses. The Administrator may not collect a guarantee fee for loans made to veterans or their spouses on or after October 1 of the first fiscal year following the enactment of this provision, unless the President's budget for the upcoming fiscal year includes a cost for the program established under this subsection. The term 'veteran or spouse of a veteran' is defined in paragraph (31)(G)(iii). The Administrator cannot collect a guarantee fee for express loans up to $150,000 made to veterans or their spouses on or after October 1 of the first fiscal year following the enactment of this provision. The provision exempts veterans or their spouses from guarantee fees for express loans up to $150,000 made after October 1 of the first fiscal year following enactment, unless the President's budget includes costs for the program.
